attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: John Hartson Is Nothing But An Ogre, He Is Shrek In A Celtic Shirt, He Cannot Speak, Run, Or - More Importantly Score Goals! He Is A Disgrace Even For A Celtic PLayer, So I Petition He Be Deoprted To His Motherland; The Swamp!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
